Address.value: 100 VICTORIA EMBANKMENT, LONDON, EC4Y 0DY, United Kingdom

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Unilever is a diversified personal product (42% of 2021 sales by value), home care (20%), and packaged food (38%) company. Its brands include Knorr soups and sauces, Hellmann's mayonnaise, Lipton teas, Axe and Dove skin products, and the TRESemme haircare brand. The firm has been acquisitive in recent years; high-profile purchases include the mail-order men's grooming business Dollar Shave Club and Seventh Generation cleaning and personal-care products.
